shrimp.name: TangentMap
shrimp.description: Read a tangent space normal map
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Read a tangent space normal map texture, like the ones generated from 3d sculpting applications. Uses the "dPdu" and "dPdv" parametric derivatives. The texture coordinates "s" and "t" are used only for the texture lookup. The output normal vector is already normalized.
